attributes.additional_details: A migrant dashboard is crucial for transparency and effective policy making. It should track data in real time like other public services, allowing for government accountability on this key issue.
attributes.background: I want all migrant data released to ensure transparency and accountability in immigration policies. The public deserves to know the full scope of migrant arrivals, impacts, and integration to make informed decisions and hold government actions to scrutiny.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Collect and Publish statistics on crimes committed by illegal immigrants
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709094
